item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Mergiraf: a syntax-aware merge driver for Git (101 points | 24 comments)
2. Show HN: HTML-to-Markdown – convert entire websites to Markdown with Golang/CLI (95 points | 24 comments)
3. Delta: A syntax-highlighting pager for Git, diff, grep, and blame output (449 points | 63 comments)
4. Texture-Less Text Rendering (81 points | 27 comments)
5. Mitochondria Are Alive (540 points | 344 comments)
6. SVDQuant: 4-Bit Quantization Powers 12B Flux on a 16GB 4090 GPU with 3x Speedup (76 points | 16 comments)
7. Multiple new macOS sandbox escape vulnerabilities (532 points | 167 comments)
8. In Memory of Stiver (411 points | 50 comments)
9. Can humans say the largest prime number before we find the next one? (209 points | 80 comments)
10. Obtainium: Get Android App Updates Directly from the Source (50 points | 31 comments)
11. 'Smart' insulin prevents diabetic highs – and deadly lows (99 points | 23 comments)
12. Optimize Database Performance in Ruby on Rails and ActiveRecord (59 points | 33 comments)
13. Stabilizing the Obra Dinn 1-bit dithering process (2017) (479 points | 96 comments)
14. Lynis – Security auditing and hardening tool, for Unix-based systems (16 points | discuss)
15. A CC-By Open-Source TTS Model with Voice Cloning (79 points | 14 comments)
16. Segmenting Credit Card Customers with K-Means: A Fun Dive into Clustering (18 points | 7 comments)
17. I quit Google to work for myself (2018) (264 points | 151 comments)
18. Money was never the end goal – mrdoob – threejs creator (26 points | 5 comments)
19. Making Electronic Calipers (143 points | 52 comments)
20. Cache Directory Tagging Specification (2004) (6 points | 1 comment)
21. The Saturn V FUELDRAULIC Gimbal System (1963) (4 points | 1 comment)
22. Maxun: Open-Source No-Code Web Data Extraction Platform (42 points | 3 comments)
23. Λ-2D: An Exploration of Drawing as Programming Language (216 points | 52 comments)
24. Funding restored for man-page maintenance (75 points | 46 comments)
25. Show HN: Asterogue, my sci-fi roguelike, is now playable on the web (294 points | 89 comments)
26. Reconstruction of Lomonosov's Discovery of Venus's Atmosphere (2012) [pdf] (18 points | 5 comments)
27. Python Logic Simulation Library (75 points | 4 comments)
28. A Random Walk Through Ada (2014) (35 points | 4 comments)
29. My Notes on Apple Math Notes (131 points | 41 comments)
30. LoRA vs. Full Fine-Tuning: An Illusion of Equivalence (223 points | 50 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
